name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing and managing high-performance solutions in complex environments, utilizing a tech stack that includes **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **GitLab**, and robust monitoring tools like **Datadog**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana**. My expertise in CI/CD automation ensures seamless deployment processes and continuous integration.
With a solid foundation in security practices, I build and maintain secure, compliant infrastructures that meet rigorous industry standards. I have a proven track record of optimizing system performance and reliability, leveraging my experience in developing microservices architectures and event-driven systems.
Additionally, I possess extensive knowledge of programming languages such as **Golang** and **Python**, allowing me to contribute effectively to cross-functional teams to enhance operational efficiency.
